DroppedPackets.Name: dropped_packets
DroppedPackets.Help: The number of packets dropped due to rule actions

InvalidDroppedPackets.Name: invalid_dropped_packets
InvalidDroppedPackets.Help: The number of packets dropped for failing packet validation due to issues with the packet

OtherDroppedPackets.Name: other_dropped_packets
OtherDroppedPackets.Help: The number of packets dropped due to reasons other than those described by InvalidDroppedPackets or DroppedPackets

Packets.Name: packets
Packets.Help: The number of packets inspected for a firewall policy or stateless rulegroup for which a custom action is defined

PassedPackets.Name: passed_packets
PassedPackets.Help: The number of packets that the firewall allowed through to their destinations

ReceivedPackets.Name: received_packets
ReceivedPackets.Help: The number of packets received by the firewall

RejectedPackets.Name: rejected_packets
RejectedPackets.Help: The number of packets rejected due to Reject stateful rule actions

StreamExceptionPolicyPackets.Name: stream_exception_policy_packets
StreamExceptionPolicyPackets.Help: The number of packets matching the firewall policy's stream exception policy

TLSDroppedPackets.Name: tls_dropped_packets
TLSDroppedPackets.Help: The number of packets dropped by the firewall while inspecting SSL/TLS packets

TLSErrors.Name: tls_errors
TLSErrors.Help: The number of errors observed by Network Firewall while inspecting SSL/TLS packets

TLSPassedPackets.Name: tls_passed_packets
TLSPassedPackets.Help: The number of packets passed by Network Firewall while inspecting SSL/TLS packets

TLSReceivedPackets.Name: tls_received_packets
TLSReceivedPackets.Help: The number of SSL/TLS packets received by the Network Firewall firewall

TLSRejectedPackets.Name: tls_rejected_packets
TLSRejectedPackets.Help: The number of packets rejected by Network Firewall while inspecting SSL/TLS packets

TLSRevocationStatusOKConnections.Name: tls_revocation_status_ok_connections
TLSRevocationStatusOKConnections.Help: The number of SSL/TLS connections to TLS servers whose certificates have been confirmed as not revoked

TLSRevocationStatusRevokedConnections.Name: tls_revocation_status_revoked_connections
TLSRevocationStatusRevokedConnections.Help: The number of SSL/TLS connections to TLS servers whose certificates have been confirmed as revoked

TLSRevocationStatusUnknownConnections.Name: tls_revocation_status_unknown_connections
TLSRevocationStatusUnknownConnections.Help: The number of SSL/TLS connections to TLS servers whose certificates revocation status is unknown or could not be determined

TLSTimedOutConnections.Name: tls_timed_out_connections
TLSTimedOutConnections.Help: The number of SSL/TLS connections that timed out during SSL/TLS inspection
